nodes.text: The Glie-44 blaster pistol was a blaster pistol manufactured by Eirriss Ryloth Defense Tech and named after Twi'lek freedom fighter Gobi Glie. The blaster was used by many Resistance members, including General Leia Organa and the pilots Poe Dameron, Ello Asty, and many others. The pistol had a power cartridge as ammunition and a reactant gas port cap in its stock.
The Glie-44 props were modified SIG Sauer P226s.
